trans-unit.source: An error occurred while backing up. Unable to obtain the schema of %s
trans-unit.target: Dogodila se greška tokom kreirnja sigurnosne kopije. Nije moguće dobiti shemu %s

trans-unit.source: Error: parameter "to" is corrupted
trans-unit.target: Greška: parametar "do" je oštećen

trans-unit.source: Error - The following e-mail template is missing: %s
trans-unit.target: Greška - sljedeći e-mail šablon nedostaje: %s

trans-unit.source: Key length must be 32 character long.
trans-unit.target: Dužina ključa mora imati 32 znaka.

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'SimpleXML' PHP extension to allow testing of PrestaShop's webservice.
trans-unit.target: Molimo aktivirajte 'SimpleXML' PHP ekstenziju da omogućite testiranje PrestaShop's web servisa.

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use SSL (https:) for webservice calls, as it avoids the "man in the middle" type security issues.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko je moguće, savjetuje se korištenje SSL (https) za pozive web servisa, što izbjegava sigurnosne propuste tipa "man in the middle".

trans-unit.source: You've selected a state for a country that does not contain states.
trans-unit.target: Odabrali ste region za državu koja ne sadrži regione.

trans-unit.source: The "%reference%" reference does not exist in the "%table%" table.
trans-unit.target: "%reference%" atribut ne postoji u "%table%" tabeli.

trans-unit.source: You can't put this menu inside itself.
You cannot delete this account because it manages warehouses. Check your warehouses first.
trans-unit.target: Ne možete obrisati ovaj račun jer upravlja skladištima. Provjerite najprije vaša skladišta.

trans-unit.source: The confirmation password does not match.
trans-unit.target: Potvrda lozinke ne odgovara.

trans-unit.source: You should have at least one employee in the administrator group.
trans-unit.target: Trebali bi imati barem jednog zaposlenika u grupi administratora.

trans-unit.source: The employee must be associated with at least one shop.
trans-unit.target: Zaposlenik mora biti dodan barem jednoj trgovini.

trans-unit.source: The uploaded file exceeds the post_max_size directive in php.ini. If your server configuration allows it, you may add a directive in your .htaccess, for example:
trans-unit.target: Prenesena datoteka relazi post_max_size direktivu u php.ini. Ukoliko konfiguracija servera dopušta možete dodati direktivu u vaš .htaccess, na primjer:

trans-unit.source: The extension of your file should be .csv.
trans-unit.target: Ekstenzija vaše datoteke bi trebala biti .csv.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while uploading / copying the file.
trans-unit.target: Dogodila se greška tokom učitavanja / kopiranja datoteke.

trans-unit.source: Advanced stock management has incorrect value. Not set for product %name%
Advanced stock management is not enabled, cannot enable on product %name%
Advanced stock management is not enabled, warehouse not set on product %name%
Warehouse did not exist, cannot set on product %name%
Incorrect value for "Depends on stock" for product %name%
Advanced stock management is not enabled, cannot set "Depends on stock" for product %name%
Look at your listings to make sure it's all there as you wished.
trans-unit.target: Pogledajte svoje unose kako biste bili sigurni da je sve tamo kako želite.

trans-unit.source: Warning, the current import may require a PHP setting update, to allow more data to be transferred. If the current import stops before the end, you should increase your PHP "post_max_size" setting to [1]%size%[/1]MB at least, and try again.
trans-unit.target: Upozorenje, trenutni uvoz može zahtijevati ažuriranje postavki PHP, kako bi se omogućilo prijenos više podataka. Ako se trenutni uvoz zaustavi prije kraja, trebate povećati postavku PHP "post_max_size" na [1]%size% [/1] MB i pokušajte ponovno.

trans-unit.source: Some errors were detected. Please check the details:
trans-unit.target: Otkrivene su neke greške. Provjerite detalje:

trans-unit.source: We made the following adjustments:
trans-unit.target: Izvršili smo sljedeće prilagodbe:

trans-unit.source: Can't add the voucher.
trans-unit.target: Vaučer se ne može dodati.

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "cache" folder.
trans-unit.target: Postavite dozvole za pisanje za "cache" direktorij.

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "sitemap.xml" file.
trans-unit.target: Postavite dozvole za pisanje na "sitemap.xml" datoteku.

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "img" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Postavite dozvole za pisanje za "img" direktorij i poddirektorije, rekurzivno.

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "log" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Postavite dozvole za pisanje za "log" direktorij i poddirektorije, rekurzivno.

trans-unit.source: No change has been detected in your files.
trans-unit.target: Promjene nisu pronađena u vašim datotekama.

trans-unit.source: Importing Supply Order Details will reset your history of ordered products, if there are any.
trans-unit.target: Uvoz detalja narudžbi nabave će resetovati istoriju naručenih proizvoda, ako ih ima.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure that you would like to delete this entity:
trans-unit.target: Jeste li sigurni da želite obrisati ovaj entitet:

trans-unit.source: Always verify the quality and integrity of your backup files!
trans-unit.target: Uvijek provjerite kvalitetu i integritet vaših datoteka sigur. kopija!

trans-unit.source: Always verify that your backup files are complete, up-to-date and valid, even if you had a success message appear during the backup process.
trans-unit.target: Uvijek provjerite da su Vaše datoteke sigurnosne kopije cjelovite, ažurirane i validne, čak i nakon obavijesti o uspješnom završetku procesa sigur. kopije.

trans-unit.source: Never restore a backup on a live site.
trans-unit.target: Nikad nemojte vraćati podatke na živom sajtu.

trans-unit.source: I have read the disclaimer. Please create a new backup.
trans-unit.target: Pročitao sam odricanje od odgovornosti. Kreiraj novu sigurnosnu kopiju.

trans-unit.source: Our team will take care of restoring your database safely.
trans-unit.target: Naš tim će se pobrinuti za sigurno vraćanje baze podataka.

trans-unit.source: Your shop is hosted by PrestaShop. Although you can create backup files here below, there are core settings you cannot access for security reasons, like the database management. Thus, only our team can proceed to a restoration.
trans-unit.target: Vaša trgovina je hostana od PrestaShopa. Iako možete napraviti sigur. kopije ovdje ispod, tu su osnovne postavke kojima ne možete pristupiti iz sigurnosnih razloga, kao i upravljanju bazama podataka. Dakle, samo naš tim može nastaviti s povratom podataka.
